entry.title: Friday: Freezing rain or snow. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets changing to snow mixed with ice pellets this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
